page.title: 09TRANSPORT (West Block)
page.content: {Birchwood} {Buses:}residents thought that the service is regular and very frequent. It is served by Lincolnshire Road Car and Lincoln City Transport.On weekdays there are 32 buses from St. Mark's bus station to Birchwood,with 12 on Sundays. {By-pass:}this was welcomed for the easier access it would bring.One resident hoped it would reduce the ammount of lorry traffic using Birchwood as a short cut to Doddington road.Birchwood Avenue was hought busy and dangerous. {Cars:}in the 7 Enumeration Districts where council housing was dominant, 42% of households owned 1 car and 3.5% owned 2.In the 4 E.D.'s where private housing dominated 62% owned 1 car,26% owned 2. (Information from census 1981).
